p: According to metabolite variations, the activity of three principal metabolic pathways was altered in shoots of L. grandiflora (Figure 5): the pathway of the glycerolipid metabolism (Holm p value < .01), the aminoacyl‐tRNA biosynthesis pathway (Holm p value = .0654), and the valine, leucine, and isoleucine degradation (Holm p value = .0654).
